name: CricketSoundsbySleepJar®
0:
”Alexa, open Cricket Sounds”
”Alexa, start Cricket Sounds”
”Alexa, launch Cricket Sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Cricket Sounds by Sleep Jar® plays sleep sounds and ambient sounds to help you sleep, relax, meditate, relieve stress, or block out unwanted noise.

Cricket Sounds is part of the Sleep Jar® brand of Skills trusted by millions of Alexa customers.

HOW TO USE:

Enable Cricket Sounds by clicking the "enable" button above, then say "Alexa, open Cricket Sounds".

By default the sound will play in a long loop until you say "Alexa, stop". To set a custom time limit, say "Alexa, set a sleep timer for 6 hours" or any other duration of time while the sound is playing. If you tend to fall asleep quickly and don't want the sounds to play all night, you can change the default play duration to 1 hour by saying "Alexa, loop off" while the sound is playing.

PRO MEMBERSHIP FEATURES:

+ Ad-free experience
+ Premium audio quality 
+ Enhanced looping (no sound gaps for 10 hours instead of 1 hour)

▪▪▪ BEAUTIFUL VISUALS ▪▪▪

Enjoy beautiful animations, a persistent clock, and rich media controls while listening to Cricket Sounds on compatible screen-equipped devices. Turn off visuals and put Cricket Sounds into the background to control smart home devices while Cricket Sounds is playing audio by saying "Alexa, ask Cricket Sounds to turn on Background Mode". You can turn visuals back on at anytime by saying "Alexa, ask Cricket Sounds to turn Background Mode off".

REVIEWS AND FEEDBACK:

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! If you love Cricket Sounds please consider writing a review, or send us an email with your feedback at support@sleepjar.com.
